system.description: You can channel the electrical energy stored in your Luminen Capacitors through your body to deliver devastating shocks in melee combat.
system.benefit:
Character can use their Luminen Capacitors to make a melee attack. Either a Half Action WS Test with no penalty for being unarmed or as an alternative to doing damage during a grapple. Character must then pass a Toughness Test or gain a level of Fatigue.

Attack Profile: 1d10+2×WP Bonus Energy Damage, 0 Penetration, Shock Quality.

rollConfig.description: Luminen Shock melee attack - 1d10+2×WP Energy damage

specialAbilities.name: Luminen Shock
specialAbilities.description: Half Action: Make a Weapon Skill Test (no penalty for being unarmed) to deliver an electrical shock. Can also be used during grapples. If you hit, deal 1d10+2×Willpower Bonus Energy damage with 0 Penetration and Shock Quality. After using this ability, you must pass a Toughness Test or gain 1 level of Fatigue.
